snippet: Researchers report that throat cancers caused by the human papillomavirus, transmitted during oral sex, have increased significantly in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Researchers report that throat cancers caused by the human papillomavirus, transmitted during oral sex, have increased significantly in the United States.

headline.main: Study Cites Increase in Cancers From HPV
headline.print_headline: Study Cites Increase In Cancers From HPV
headline.seo: Study Cites Increase in Throat Cancers Caused by HPV
